messages.content: The NHS has been my life. [...] One of our proudest institutions is being damaged by a desperate quest for privatisation by Theresa May’s Conservatives. Our beloved NHS is at breaking point. [...] I am campaigning for the Liberal Democrats in this election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A clear plan to fund the NHS. A penny on income tax for the NHS will ease the pressure on NHS staff and patients until long-term solutions can be found.

issues.health: The NHS has been my life. [...] One of our proudest institutions is being damaged by a desperate quest for privatisation by Theresa May’s Conservatives. Our beloved NHS is at breaking point. [...]

politicalExperience.role: Chair of the Royal College of General Practitioners
politicalExperience.achievements: Served our NHS for nearly 35 years and started work as a doctor in 1982.

endorsements.endorsement: The NHS has been my life. [...] One of our proudest institutions is being damaged by a desperate quest for privatisation by Theresa May’s Conservatives.

quotes.text: The future of the NHS is in your hands.
As an NHS doctor, I am fearful of the damage that would be done to the NHS by an all-powerful Conservative government. At this election, the future of our NHS is in your hands.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Five more years of Theresa May’s Conservatives will give them free reign for more and more NHS cuts.
